FuncDef:
The remark-color enable command enables the re-marking function for flow queues in a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode to differentiate and re-mark PIR and CIR traffic.
The undo remark-color enable command disables the re-marking function for flow queues in a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode to stop differentiating and re-marking PIR and CIR traffic.
By default, the re-marking function is disabled for flow queues.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can configure scheduling parameters for eight priority flow queues in a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode. To enable the re-marking function for a flow queue with specified priorities, run this command. After the command is run, the system differentiates and re-marks PIR and CIR traffic.
Prerequisites
A flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode has been configured.
Precautions
The re-marking function takes effect only for upstream traffic.
Only LPUI-52/LPUF-53/LPUI-242/LPUF-243/LPUI-242-CM/LPUI-242-G/LPUI-402/LPUI-402-CM/LPUF-483/LPUI-2T-L/LPUI-2T-CM/LPUF-1T2 boards support a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
